org.magnos.asset.base
Class BaseFutureAsset<T>

java.lang.Object
  org.magnos.asset.base.BaseFutureAsset<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The asset type.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, Callable<T>, FutureAsset<T>
public class BaseFutureAsset<T>
extends Object
implements FutureAsset<T>

A base FutureAsset implementation.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

getInfo

public AssetInfo getInfo()
Description copied from interface: FutureAsset
The information required to load the asset. This is used to generate the asset in the background to be set on this FutureAsset.

Specified by:
getInfo in interface FutureAsset<T>
Returns:
The AssetInfo used to load the asset.

load

public T load(boolean loadIfCanceled)
Description copied from interface: FutureAsset
Loads the asset and returns immediately. If the asset is currently being loaded in the background this will wait for the background process to complete. The user must check the status of the asset, if it already failed then this will do nothing.

Specified by:
load in interface FutureAsset<T>
Parameters:
loadIfCanceled - Whether the asset should be loaded if the FutureAsset has been canceled already. If true the asset will always be loaded, if false the asset will not be loaded if the status is canceled.
Returns:
The asset loaded.

get

public T get()
Description copied from interface: FutureAsset
Returns the asset as-is. If the asset has not been completely loaded yet, null will be returned.

Specified by:
get in interface FutureAsset<T>
Returns:
The loaded asset or null if it hasn't been loaded yet.

cancel

public boolean cancel()
Description copied from interface: FutureAsset
Cancels loading the asset if it hasn't been loaded yet.

Specified by:
cancel in interface FutureAsset<T>
Returns:
True if the FutureAsset has successfully canceled or it is already in the canceled state.

loaded

public void loaded()
Description copied from interface: FutureAsset
A method that should be called by the user when they take the non-null asset through FutureAsset.get() or forcefully take it through FutureAsset.load(boolean). Other implementations of FutureAsset may need to be notified by the main thread through this method.

Specified by:
loaded in interface FutureAsset<T>
See Also:
FutureAsset

getStatus

public FutureAssetStatus getStatus()
Description copied from interface: FutureAsset
The current status of the asset.

Specified by:
getStatus in interface FutureAsset<T>
Returns:
The status of the asset.

getFailureReason

public AssetException getFailureReason()
Description copied from interface: FutureAsset
If the asset failed loading, this is the exception that it threw.

Specified by:
getFailureReason in interface FutureAsset<T>
Returns:
The exception that was thrown from the asset failing to load, or null if the asset has not failed loading or has even been loaded yet.
See Also:
FutureAssetStatus.Failed
